main event: On 4 March 1949 at approximately 1420, multiple employees of Watson Laboratories in Red Bank, New Jersey, observed a disc-shaped object traveling rapidly in the sky while a B-29 was approaching.
interesting points: The object was described as dull white and approximately the size of an 8-inch dinner plate,It was noted that the object made a half-loop turn and disappeared,The sighting lasted about one minute,Four qualified observers including radio mechanics reported the sighting,No sound or propulsion was heard during the observation.
witness description: employees of Watson Laboratories, including radio mechanics and an administrative assistant
